mapper.select: SELECT D.DAY_WORKLOG_CODE, M.MEMBER_CODE, D.DAY_REPORTING_DATE, D.MORNING_DAY_CONTENT, D.AFTERNOON_DAY_CONTENT, D.MORNING_DAY_NOTE, D.AFTERNOON_DAY_NOTE, D.DAY_SPECIAL_NOTE FROM TBL_DAY_WORKLOG D JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON (D.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE DAY_WORKLOG_CODE = #{ dayWorklogCode } ORDER BY DAY_WORKLOG_CODE DESC
